attributes.action: Prosecute ALL creators and viewers of child pornography
attributes.additional_details: We the people insist that this government, its agencies and police forces actively seek out and prosecute the creators and ALL viewers of child pornography. Today's announcement by the director of the National Crime Agency is an outrage and an epic dereliction of duty and will, in the long term, end up normalising the use of child pornography.

rejection.details: This would be a police operational matter for individual forces.
